Package org.apache.struts2.util

Class DomHelper.DOMBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.apache.struts2.util.DomHelper.DOMBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler
Enclosing class:
DomHelper
public static class DomHelper.DOMBuilder extends Object implements ContentHandler
The DOMBuilder is a utility class that will generate a W3C DOM Document from SAX events.
Author:
Carsten Ziegeler
